#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define M 1000000
#define ll long long 
#define f(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
//#define f(i,j,n) for(i=j;i<n;i++)
#define si(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define sl(i) scanf("%lld",&i)

#define pi(i) printf("%d\n",i);
using namespace std;
#define pl(i) printf("%lld\n",i)
int main()
{ 
	int p[28],t,i,f;
	string s,s1;
	si(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>s>>s1;
		f(i,25)p[i]=0;
		f(i,s.length())
		{
			p[s[i]-'a']++;
			
		}
		f(i,s1.length())
		{
			p[s1[i]-'a']--;
			
		}
		f=0;
		f(i,25)
		{
			if(p[i]!=0){f=1;break;}
		}
		if(f==1)cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		else if(f==0)cout<<"YES"<<endl;

	}
	return 0;
}
